replies.body:
Those players might be Silver or Gold rank, but their MMR is closer to Platinum. 

OP.GG estimates the MMR of **Lux** and **Taric** to be closer to Gold 2 (1700 MMR) and Pantheon at Gold 3 (1600 MMR). Their actual MMRs are probably a lot closer to Platinum 5.

Also it seems like they might be smurfing to me (which would explain the unusual MMRs).  78%, 64% and 57% winrates are a pretty good indicator of that.

__*

_So was this match fair?_

+ Well **Lux**, **Taric** and **Pantheon** were all in Dynamic Queue together... and there's definitely something to be said about how fair DQ is on the solo player.

 But apart from that, it's absolutely fair in the sense that you were meaning. Your team had a 50% chance of winning and everyone's skill was pretty even.
How can you tell they were in queue together? I thought that information was now hidden.

Yeap you are correct, that information is now hidden. 

But OP.GG still shows if players often play with each other. Those 3 had 8 - 15 shared games together if I remember correctly, so with that we can made an educated guess that they were dynamic queued for this game too.

I won't share any of the OP.GG accounts here to respect this guy's privacy. But if you do some google-fu with what you can see of **Lux**'s name, then should be able to find their accounts fairly easily :)

Yeah, I always check the 'Recently Played With' when I scoping out possible premades in my games. But in this case I couldn't (ofc) so I was wondering if there was another indicator you knew about that I wasn't aware of  ^_^
Plus that Taric... 20 games played and 100% winrate? And yet their overall winrate across all champs is only 63%.... Something fishy there....
Sometimes life throws you a curveball bud
